text: Vassily Sergeyevich Kulkov (; 11 June 1966 - 10 October 2020) was a Russian footballer, and manager. He was born in Moscow. He was a central defender and defensive midfielder. He was best known for his spells at Spartak Moscow and Benfica. He also played for the Russian national team from 1992 to 1995. Kulkov died of brain cancer on 10 October 2020 in Moscow, aged 54.Скончался бывший футболист «Спартака» и сборной России Василий Кульков ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Footballers from Moscow Category:Russian football managers
title: Vasili Kulkov
